ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Medical Devices Regulations (1667 â€“ Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the MEDICAL DEVICES REGULATIONS (1667 - MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM), in order to amend section 32.7 of the Regulations to ensure that the reinstatement of recognition of a registrar is a requirement, if the situation giving rise to the cessation of recognition was corrected or proven to be unfounded, as requested by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0322 Publication Date: 2012-01-04
